5 Android Apps for WhatsApp Power User 

If you have a dual sim phone, then you may want to install two separate WhatsApp account in it.

But the problem is- WhatsApp do not support that and the workaround (like OGWhatsApp or other modded version of WhatsApp) either do not work or  can get your WhatsApp account permanently banned. 

So here a simple solution using and Android app called Disa. 

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.disa&hl=en
